name: AP_CLAIM_IF_ACE_OP_MAI
description: This table extracts data received from prospective payment systems (PPS) pricer for a claim in AEB.OP 'MUE Adjudication Indicator'.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MUE_ADJUD_IND
columns.description: Indicates the type of Medically Unlikely Edit (MUE) that was applied to this claim line. Data received in AEB.OP block on incoming message.
